product_name: REI Rendezvous 3-in-1 Convertible Pants - Women's Petite
long_description: With the REI Rendezvous 3-in-1 convertible pants for petite women you can travel to the far corners of the earth with just one pair of pants. Practical and versatile, don't leave home without them. Lightweight yet tough nylon fabric breathes well and dries fast; spandex adds shape retention and a touch of stretch. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Fixed waistband with belt loops hits just below the belly button and secures with zip fly and snap; internal drawcord customizes the fit. Lower legs zip off to convert to capri length and again to a 7 in. inseam short, making the REI Rendezvous convertible pants perfect for almost every temperature. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees facilitate freedom of movement. 2 zippered front pockets discreetly secure small valuables; 2 rear pockets provide additional space; interior key pocket adds another hidden option. The REI Rendezvous 3-in-1 convertible pants for petite women feature a 29.5 in. inseam.
